sources.title: Stranger on the Run (1967)
sources.description: Stranger on the Run is a 1967 American made-for-television Western film directed by Donald Siegel and starring Henry Fonda, Anne Baxter and Michael Parks. The storyÂ  follows Ben Chamberlain, a former inmate and alcoholic, who arrives in a railway town searching for a woman named Alma. After discovering her dead body, he becomes the target of a sheriff and his posse, who mistakenly believe he is the murderer, leading to a tense chase through the desert.

metadata.Plot: A drifter finds himself wrongly accused of murder by a power-crazed sheriff. The sheriff gives him a horse, some supplies, and a one-hour head start into the desert, then he will send his murderous posse after him.
metadata.Actors: Henry Fonda, Anne Baxter, Michael Parks
